Question: This change in character would provide a springboard to the "Tragedy of this person" storyline that underlies the prequels.
Hints: This person kills the Jedi and kidnaps the man's young Force-sensitive son, whom he raises as his secret apprentice.
Anakin battled Kenobi on the site of a volcano and was badly wounded, but was then reborn as this person.
A grotesque of this person looms over the east face of the Washington National Cathedral's northwest tower.
